Title: Registration fails to detect duplicate email
Description: User registers using an already existing email ID
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Go to Registration Page   2. Enter email: existing@example.com3. Fill rest of details4. Click Submit

Title: Cart allows quantity exceeding available stock
Description: Cart does not validate maximum stock limit
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Product Page2. Enter quantity: 9993. Click Add to Cart4. View Cart

Title: Payment gateway timeout not handled gracefully
Description: During PayPal payment, if timeout occurs, app behaves unpredictably
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Proceed to Payment2. Choose PayPal3. Wait without completing payment
